summary: This collection of documents pertains to Case 9145, involving the Research Institute of America and Leo Cherne's cooperation with the CIA to provide cover for agents. The documents detail arrangements for meetings, background information on William J. Acom, and the extent of Cherne's involvement in backstopping the cover story.
title: Case 9145: Research Institute of America and Covert Operations
sender: Lea, Ashcraft, Support (Coleman), Support (Travis), McCann, Millard
